sql.name: hbeoms.formrejectedlink
sql.item: select distinct (t.c1), t.c700000001,t.c700000003 as 工单编号, t.c700000006 as 建单时间, t.c700000004 as 建单人, t.c700000011 as 主题,t.c700000015 as 紧急程度, t.c700000014 as 所属专业, t.c700000010 as 工单状态 from {1000} t,(select * from {500} union all select * from {600}) pro where 1=1 and t.C1=pro.C700020001 and t.c700000001=pro.c700020002 {1} {3} {9} {10}

sql.name: hbeoms.formrejectttablelink
sql.item: select 't'||ars.SCHEMAID from ARSCHEMA ars,{400} t where ars.name=t.C650000002
